tour_name: Imperial Cities & Atlas Mountains: Royal Morocco Tour

sections.title: Casablanca, Rabat & the Imperial City of Fes
sections.content: Begin your luxurious Moroccan honeymoon in Casablanca, where modern elegance meets historical charm. Explore iconic landmarks like the Hassan II Mosque, a marvel of intricate craftsmanship. Journey to Rabat, the nation's capital, and discover the historical sites such as the Hassan Tower and the picturesque Kasbah of the Udayas. Indulge in a romantic evening with dinner at a Michelin star restaurant that blends Moroccan flavors with modern culinary techniques. Then, travel to Fes, immersing yourselves in its ancient medina, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Partake in a private, hands-on traditional cooking class, learning the secrets of Moroccan cuisine, followed by a rejuvenating hammam experience designed for couples, a truly immersive cultural experience. Consider a private tour of the tanneries, understanding the art and tradition of leather making, a fundamental part of the Fes's heritage.

sections.title: The Blue Pearl of Chefchaouen & Atlas Mountain Retreat
sections.content: Embark on a magical day trip to Chefchaouen, the enchanting 'Blue City' nestled in the Rif Mountains. Wander hand-in-hand through its labyrinthine alleyways, capturing stunning photos of the azure-washed buildings. Savor a romantic lunch at a local restaurant with breathtaking views. Return to Fes before venturing into the majestic Atlas Mountains. Enjoy personalized hiking excursions through Berber villages, connecting with the local culture and witnessing the stunning landscapes. Spend evenings in a luxurious mountain riad offering breathtaking vistas, where you can savour private dinners under the stars.

sections.title: Marrakech's Vibrant Souks & Essaouira Coastal Bliss
sections.content: Travel to Marrakech, the 'Red City', and prepare to be enchanted by its vibrant souks and the electric atmosphere of Jemaa el-Fna square. Indulge in a romantic hot air balloon ride over the city at sunrise, providing breathtaking views and unforgettable memories. Explore the secret gardens of Marrakech, discovering hidden oases of tranquility. Savour Moroccan cuisine at its finest, experiencing private rooftop dining experiences and gourmet cooking classes. Conclude your honeymoon with a relaxing stay on the Atlantic coast in Essaouira, known for its charming medina and beautiful beaches. Enjoy romantic sunset strolls along the shore, explore the art galleries, and savor fresh seafood dinners overlooking the ocean.
